title: Officials: 2-year-old accidentally shot in NKY
content:
A 2-year-old girl was shot in Highland Heights Monday afternoon, officials said.
Campbell County dispatchers confirmed that a child had been shot in the 100 block of Bon Jan Lane sometime around 2:30 p.m.
The child was accidentally shot and taken to Cincinnati Children's Hospital, according to Campbell County officials.
The child went into emergency surgery, and her current condition is not known, officials said.
Police questioned a person in the backseat of an unmarked police car on Bon Jan Lane about 20 minutes before driving away.
Highland Heights, Cold Spring and Campbell County police responded to the scene.
No other information was immediately available.
